instructions: If your SRM file contains a Super Nintendo game save, you can open it in Snes9x (multiplatform) or ZSNES (Windows, Linux). For example, to open an SRM file in Snes9x, place the file in the program's Saves directory. Then, open the corresponding game ROM, and use its in-game menu to load your saved game.
If your SRM file contains a different type of game save, you should refer to your emulator's instructions for how to load that type of SRM file.
